specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > Boucle BouclÃ© is a fabric characterized by its looped, knotted, or curled texture on the surface. It can be made from various materials, not just wool, and these unique loops give the fabric a warm feel and a rich, dimensional appearance.
